@logging_to_appins
def automation_table_creation():
    '''
    This function check for existing table for specific json file in a delta folder and if the data has been already used, 
    the message Table already exists with correct location will be displayed.
    Otherwise, the tables will be created using the create_table_from_schema schema 
    '''


    ### establish connection to azure files and create client
    from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()


    from notebookutils import mssparkutils
    storage_account= spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get') + ".dfs.core.windows.net"

   
    #asigning the location of the container and the folder for the parquete files 
    harmonised_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-harmonised@' + storage_account
    harmonised_storage_delta_folder = 'lib/'
    delta_lake_database_name = "odw_harmonised_db"


    #asigning a value/loaction for the schemas
    config_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-config@' + storage_account
    json_schema_folder='harmonised_table_definitions'


    #import of utilities
    from notebookutils import mssparkutils
    #asigning a path to find the schema files 
    json_schema_path = config_storage_container + '/' + json_schema_folder


    #print('json_schema_path '+json_schema_path)


    files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(json_schema_path)
    #looping through the files 
    for file in files:
        #print(file)
        #json_schema=spark.read.text("abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/[enter path here]", wholetext=True).first().value
        #asigning the path to each json_schema from the contents of the each file
        json_schema=spark.read.text(file.path, wholetext=True).first().value
        #creating table while looping through the files so we can change the schemas, file name, and folder based on the file info
        create_table_from_schema(json_schema, delta_lake_database_name,file.name.lower().split('.json')[0],harmonised_storage_container+"/",harmonised_storage_delta_folder+file.name.lower().split('.json')[0]) 

   
#calling the function 
automation_table_creation()
